###HUSK legge inn alle mapper klare
```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
source(file.path("R", "functions.R"))
library(distilltools)
library(metathis)
meta() %>%
  meta_description(
    " onelyder ~ Lyder Aleksander Mathisen "
  ) %>%
  meta_name("github-repo" = "lyder7/onelyder_webpage.com") %>%
  meta_viewport() %>%
  meta_social(
    title = "onelyder.com",
    url = "https://onelyder.com/",
    image = "https://onelyder.com/images/lyderimage.png",
    image_alt = "A photo of Lyer Aleksander Mathisen",
    og_type = "website",
    og_author = c("Lyder Aleksander Mathisen"),
    twitter_card_type = "summary",
    twitter_creator = "@Pierre_Lyder"
  )
```

### Welcome to my personal website!

I am a researcher, engineer, musician, swing dancer, [`r make_icon("fab fa-r-project")`](https://www.r-project.org/about.html) enthusiast, and an Assistant Professor at George Washington University in the [Department of Engineering Management and Systems Engineering](http://emse.seas.gwu.edu/). I study technological change, with a focus on accelerating the transition to environmentally sustainable and energy-saving technologies.
